recipe.title: Celery Root and Apple Salad with Hazelnut Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1/4 cup hazelnut oil plus additional for drizzling (optional)
1 medium celery root, peeled, cut into matchstick-size strips
1 medium fennel bulb, halved lengthwise, thinly sliced
1 unpeeled Gala apple, cut into strips
instructions: Whisk first 5 ingredients in small bowl. Whisk in 1/4 cup hazelnut oil and olive oil.
For salad: Combine celery root, fennel, and apple in large bowl. Toss with vinaigrette. Top with Parmesan. Drizzle with additional hazelnut oil, if desired.
Combine celery root, fennel, and apple in large bowl. Toss with vinaigrette. Top with Parmesan. Drizzle with additional hazelnut oil, if desired.
